Format.description: Date/time format of a date parameter

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 2  
Maximum Length: 100  
Update requires: No interruption

TimezoneOffset.markdownDescription:
Timezone offset

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 6  
Pattern: ^(Z|[-+](\d|\d{2}|\d{2}:?\d{2}))$  
Update requires: No interruption

LocaleCode.description: Locale code for a date parameter
LocaleCode.markdownDescription:
Locale code for a date parameter

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 2  
Maximum Length: 100  
Pattern: ^[A-Za-z0-9_\.#@\-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption
